#text=Yesterday we got to ride the bus downtown to the Fisherman 's Wharf .
#text=Before we left , we checked the schedule to see what bus we should take and what time it would pick up .
#text=10 minutes before the bus was scheduled to pick up in our area , we walked to the street corner and stopped in front of the '' `` Bus Stop '' '' sign .
